Welcome to JS Games

JS Games is a website that offers three simple games built with JavaScript - Rock Paper Scissors, Etch-a-Sketch, and a calculator. These games are accessible and easy to play. The Rock Paper Scissors game lets you play against the computer, while the Etch-a-Sketch game allows you to draw on a canvas using your cursor. The calculator allows you to perform basic arithmetic operations. Overall, JS Games provides a fun and interactive way to practice your JavaScript skills and enjoy some classic games.
